AGENDA
**18.00 – 18:30 Meet & Greet**

**18:30 - 19:15 Open AI Workshop:**
Dive into the world of AI with our focused workshop on prompt engineering for OpenAI models. Designed for developers, this session will equip you with the skills to craft effective prompts, ensuring you get the best out of AI interactions. Join us to unlock the full potential of OpenAI in your projects.

**19:15 - 19:45 Pizza and Networking**
\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**19:45 - 20:30 Open AI Workshop Continued...**

**20:30 - Pub**
title: Learn how to use OpenAI models using prompt engineering
